data.title: prof.dr. (Jan Peter) JP Balkenende
data.text:
‘There is a difference between doing things right and doing the right things’

Professor Emeritus Jan Peter Balkenende and Professor Karen Maas discuss whether companies contribute enough to broad welfare

Wednesday 10 Jan 2024

In the media

Authors Jan Peter Balkenende and Govert Buijs present book to President of the European Parliament

On Thursday 30 November 2023, the President of the European Parliament, Roberta Metsola, received a new book by Jan Peter Balkenende and Govert Buijs.

Friday 1 Dec 2023

General
